entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
